DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate role 25-gauge transconjuntival sutureless vitrectomy ( TSV ) patient persistent vitreous floater underwent multifocal intraocular lens ( IOL ) implantation .
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : The aim study evaluate role 25-gauge transconjuntival sutureless vitrectomy ( TSV ) patient persistent vitreous floater underwent multifocal intraocular lens ( IOL ) implantation . Setting : Hospital Oftalmológico de Brasília , Brasília , DF , Brazil . Methods : Fourteen eye 11 patient multifocal IOL implant associate vitreous opacity underwent 25-gauge vitrectomy prospectively analyze . Information collect include near distance uncorrected visual acuity ( UCDVA ) , best correct distance visual acuity ( BCDVA ) , spherical equivalent ( SE ) 3 month vitrectomy . Patients question surgery satisfaction visual improvement vitrectomy .
DOC.criteria: disable vitreous floater Agerelated cataract Unsatisfactory correction glass central endothelial cell count less 2000 cells/mm2 glaucoma intraocular pressure great 21 mmHg amblyopia retinal abnormality diabetes mellitus steroid immunosuppressive treatment connective tissue disease
